about_the_game:
Fight, Drive, Survive.

Your own car:

Build and customize your cars, from rugged off-road trucks to agile scavenger bikes. Collect parts, salvage resources, and build the ultimate survival machine.

Navigate the Wasteland:

Explore a vast and treacherous open world filled with hidden dangers, forgotten ruins, and hostile factions. Roam through desolate landscapes, bustling scrapyards, and abandoned cities as you search for resources and unravel the mysteries of the apocalypse.

Conquer the Diesel-Fueled Skies:

Engage in heart-pounding vehicular combat against raiders. Outmaneuver your enemies, unleash devastating firepower, and fight to claim dominion over the wasteland.

Survive Against All Odds:

Adapt to the harsh realities of survival as you scavenge for food, water, shelter and fuel. Manage your resources wisely, craft essential tools and equipment, and fortify your vehicles against the threats of the wasteland.

Forge Your Legacy:

Shape your own destiny in a world where every choice matters. Form alliances, make enemies, and carve out your place in the diesel-fueled skies. Will you rise as a legendary survivor, or fall victim to the merciless wilderness?

Key Features:


  • Build and customize your own vehicles for survival in the wasteland.
  • Explore a vast open world filled with danger, discovery, and opportunity.
  • Engage in intense vehicular combat against rival factions and mutated creatures.
  • Adapt to the ever-changing challenges of the wasteland and carve out your own legacy.

name: Diesel Skies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 Series Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Build and customize your cars, scavenge for scraps and fuel and fight raiders for survival in a vast post-apocalyptic open world filled with danger.
